data.description:
Holopoint is pure archery madness. Fight your way through waves of responsive targets, samurai, and highly dangerous ninjas - all while drawing, nocking, and shooting your arrows as quickly as possible. 

Holopoint is a skill based game where progression is based on player skill and training rather than unlocks. Like many arcade style games, personal progress and a high score is the goal. This game quickly becomes difficult and requires an active mindset. Holopoint is designed so that only a few determined archers will reach the last wave.

WARNING: THIS GAME GETS INTENSE. REMEMBER TO BREATH AND TAKE BREAKS.

changelog.change_log:
Add support for offline play
Migrate save data to Meta servers

Added credits. Added Ground Boundary option in options menu. Added seasonal effects. Replaced tutorial image with an animation. Rotated world 90 degrees to align with default menu scene orientation. Adjusted Depth Buffer Bounds.

•	Increased render scale on Quest 2 for greatly improved visuals.
•	Added Time Trial mode and Achievements.
•	Changed material on debug menu to be dark themed.
•	Enabled AA system for improved visuals on Quest across the board.
•	Increased PLAYER_TAKE_DAMAGE sound effect volume.
•	Turned on dynamic Fixed Foveated Rendering to dynamically balance framerate with resolution.
•	Updated handedness check to set the active controller to the one that pulled the trigger last.
•	Changed checkpoint unlock waves to be one greater so all prior waves must be cleared before progressing to a checkpoint.
•	Fixed bug with Linkers` Links remaining linked to objects that respawn on the same frame they are destroyed
•	Fixed bug where Linkers` Links would link to the center of the dojo's floor if the target they linked to was destroyed the same frame the link was formed.
•	Updated engine version for internal bug fixes.
•	Changed Mip Map Aniso Level to reduce noticeable blur on environmental textures.
•	Changed Mip Map filter from Box to Kaiser to render sharper details on environmental textures.
•	Removed instance of identical vertices in environmental model to remove z-fighting.
•	Fixed bug where Linkers would link together before their models became visible.
•	Fixed bug where Linkers would flash on screen for one frame about half a second before they appear. 
•	Fixed issue with left trigger events being duplicated.
•	Spaced data loading over multiple frames to reduce the time loading takes per-frame.
•	Extending scene transition time to help cover initialization delays.
Fixed issue with leaderboard updates causing frame drops. Changed player placement on leaderboard.
Post Release Update. Added Social Leaderboards

Updated wave settings to better balance difficulty between waves
Changed build to beta version code
